Name: Chibi Ninja Shino-kun: Treasure of Demon Tower
About the game: Put on your Ninja pants! Inspired by Japanese ninja games from the 80s and 90s, Chibi Ninja Shino-kun: Treasure of Demon Tower is a fast and smooth retro platformer in which you climb a giant tower while dodging enemies, traps and other obstacles. Use your wall jump, hookshot and ceiling running abilities to make it past the various enemies and discover the legendary treasure of Demon Tower! 100+ levels of ninja mayhem Be a ninja: Jump off walls, run on ceilings, use your hookshot! Fight zombies, demons, ghosts and dudes with shields A time attack mode for speedy ninjas Obligatory lava level
